law.full_text:
SEVERABILITY.
If any section, subsection, sentence clause, phrase or portion of this ordinance, including but not limited to any exemption, is for any reason held to be invalid or unconstitutional by the decision of any court of competent jurisdiction, such decision shall not affect the validity of the remaining portions of this ordinance. The Council of the City of Los Angeles hereby declares that it would have adopted this ordinance and each section, subsection, sentence, clause, phrase or portion thereof, irrespective of the fact that any one or more sections, subsections, sentences, clauses, phrases or portions be declared invalid or unconstitutional.

unit.catch_line: Application Of Provisions Relating To Exclusions And Exemptions.
Existing Sales And Use Tax Ordinances Suspended.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
SEVERABILITY. (§ 21.6.9)
SEVERABILITY. If any section, subsection, sentence clause, phrase or portion of this ordinance, including but not limited to any exemption, is for any reason held to be invalid or unconstitutional by the decision of any court of competent jurisdiction, such decision shall not affect the validity of the remaining portions of this ordinance. The Council of the City of Los Angeles hereby declares that it would have adopted this ordinance and each section, subsection, sentence, clause, phrase or portion thereof, irrespective of the fact that any one or more sections, subsections, sentences, clauses, phrases or portions be declared invalid or unconstitutional.
